# FASTQ quality scheme

There are three different quality schemes
-   Sanger
-   Solexa
-   Illumina

| **Name**      | **ASCII character range** | **Offset** | **Quality score type** | **Quality score range** |
|---------------|---------------|---------------|---------------|---------------|
| Sanger, Illumina (version 1.8 onward) | 33-126                    | 33         | PHRED                  | 0-93                    |
| Solexa, early Illinina(before 1.3)    | 59-126                    | 64         | Solexa                 | 5-62                    |
| Illumina(version 1.3-1.7)             | 64-126                    | 64         | PHRED                  | 0-62                    |


# Conversion ASCII code to PHRED score (sanger)
$Q = ASCII code - 33$

# Base correct probability
$$P = 10^{-Q/10}$$

# Base quality
$$Q = -10*log_{10}^{P}$$
